fxInfo_label: Subnational election area more free and fair characteristics
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_question: How would you describe the areas of the country in which elections are significantly more free and fair?

fxInfo_responses.value: Rural. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_0]
Urban. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_1]
Areas that are less economically developed. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_2]
Areas that are more economically developed. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_3]
Inside the capital city. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_4]
Outside the capital city. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_5]
North. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_6]
South. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_7]
West. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_8]
East. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_9]
Areas of civil unrest (including areas where insurgent groups are active). (0=No, 1=Yes)[v2elsnmrfc_10]
Areas where illicit activity is widespread. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_11]
Areas that are very sparsely populated. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_12]
Areas that are remote (difficult to reach by available transportation, for example). (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_13]
Areas where there are indigenous populations. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_14]
Areas where the national ruling party or group is strong. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_15]
Areas where the national ruling party or group is weak. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_16]
Areas that were subject to a longer period of foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_17]
Areas that were subject to a shorter period of foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_18]
Areas that were recently subject to foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_19]
Areas that have not recently been subject to foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_20]
None of the above. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2elsnmrfc_21]
